name: Blood Rite
description:
BLOOD RITE

You have been cut by Kaaldrok. The holy knife.
You have chosen to pay the debt of your sins with your blood.
As your honorable blood touches the soil,
you will quickly find a useless death.
Bring 3 skulls of fallen offers to the altar and rise up to die the great death of Aldrak!

Controls: Arrow keys

Team: Julien Lussiez & Twan Mul
